thread.title: Airbnb makes a big play for business travelers
thread.title_full: Airbnb makes a big play for business travelers

author: Madeline Bilis
title: Airbnb makes a big play for business travelers
text:
San Francisco-based home rental platform Airbnb has rolled out a new and improvedâ€¦ more Airbnb wants you to know home sharing isn't just for pleasure -- it's for business, too. To attract more business travelers, the San-Francisco based startup revamped its Airbnb for Business platform to streamline the process of managing company travel. The new business travel program is a global expansion, allowing companies around the world to more easily to manage itineraries and expense reports within Airbnb's dashboard. Airbnb initially launched its business travel program last July, and said it saw 700 percent growth in its first year. Google, Twilio, Salesforce and SoundCloud are among more than 250 companies that have joined the program. Through the improved platform, employees will be able to book Airbnbs and expense them directly back to their company. Airbnb's services are integrated with travel management company Concur Technologies.
